content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Bishan East" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Bishan Planning Area in Central Region, Singapore **Bishan East** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 碧山东) is a subzone within the planning area of [Bishan](/wiki/Bishan,_Singapore), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), as defined by the [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) (URA). Its boundary is made up of Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1 in the north; Bishan Road in the west; Braddell Road in the south; and the [Central Expressway](/wiki/Central_Expressway,_Singapore) (CTE) in the east. Bishan East is where the town centre of Bishan New Town is located. Landmarks in the subzone include [Bishan MRT station](/wiki/Bishan_MRT_station), [Bishan Bus Interchange](/wiki/Bishan_Bus_Interchange), [Bishan Stadium](/wiki/Bishan_Stadium), [Bishan Public Library](/wiki/Bishan_Public_Library), Bishan Community Club and [Junction 8](/wiki/Junction_8). This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Bishan East
